alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 5:41AM AKST until December 27 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility occurring. Additional accumulations of 1 inch are expected. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. North winds will gust to 40 mph. * WHERE...Near Passes of the Southeastern Brooks Range. * WHEN...Until noon today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northeast winds gusting to 40 mph near Passes will cause low in blowing snow. Winds will decrease this afternoon and conditions will improve then. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means that visibilities will be limited due to strong winds blowing snow around. Use caution when traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
